    • Method Detail

      • sendNonUnifrom

        public <T extends ICRMessageType> void sendNonUnifrom(java.util.HashMap<java.util.UUID,DataPacketCR<T>> dataPackets)
        In contrast to sendPacket() method which send datapacket uniformly, i.e., the same data packet to every one. This method send datapacket non-uniformly, i.e., different message to different user.
        Parameters:
        dataPackets -
